definition: compact disc/CD or DVD/CD ROM/CL:片[pian4],張|张[zhang1]

plate/dish/tray/board/hard drive (computing)/to build/to coil/to check/to examine/to transfer (property)/to make over/classifier for food: dish, helping/to coil/classifier for coils of wire/classifier for games of chess
CD or DVD drive/abbr. to 光驅|光驱
Blu-ray disk, Sony high definition DVD disk

sentences.english: Shown below are specific features of edge-to-edge holographic CD's.
sentences.chinese: 下面介绍边到边全息图像光盘的具体特征。

sentences.english: Double-click the icon to view the contents of the disc.
sentences.chinese: 双击该图标来查看光盘内容。

sentences.english: But I have bought many educational CD- ROMs before and none of them is good.
sentences.chinese: 但以前我买过很多教育光盘，它们中没有一个是好的。

sentences.english: What are they doing? They're listening to a CD.
sentences.chinese: 他们在干什么他们在听CD光盘。

sentences.english: Lisson to the music and sing the song.
sentences.chinese: 幼儿欣赏歌曲光盘，跟唱歌曲。

sentences.english: Got a backup CD that’s too scratched up to read very well?
sentences.chinese: 备份光盘太满而不能读来吗？

sentences.english: How much hard disk space do I need to burn a disc?
sentences.chinese: 刻录一张光盘需要多大的硬盘空间？

sentences.english: The CD also includes three original pieces written by Jennifer Grady.
sentences.chinese: 该光盘还包括詹妮弗格雷迪写了三首原创作品。

sentences.english: You can trade back your old games, too.
sentences.chinese: 你也可以用你的游戏光盘去交换。

sentences.english: I have bought many educational CD-ROMs before and none of them is good.
sentences.chinese: 我以前卖过许多教育光盘，而它们中没有一个是好的。

sentences.english: Yellow John ROM, to start the famous bloodline.
sentences.chinese: 黄约翰光盘，开始著名的血统。

sentences.english: The correct way is to press the CD tray pop-up button so that automatically return to position.
sentences.chinese: 正确的做法是按下弹出键使光盘托架自动回仓。

sentences.english: Normally, you will have to pay for the cost of the CD and delivery.
sentences.chinese: 这种情况下，你需要支付光盘的成本费和寄送的费用。

sentences.english: On front wheels with disc brake mounts the disc side will have more tension.
sentences.chinese: 与盘式制动器前轮支架，光盘方将有更多的紧张。

sentences.english: The Shanghai blue-ray disc plant is located in the Songjiang Industrial Zone.
sentences.chinese: 上海蓝光光盘工厂位于松江工业区。

sentences.english: Professional Cooking, College Version with CD-ROM, 6th Edition.
sentences.chinese: 专业烹饪，大学版，附光盘，第6版。

definition: to record on a CD or DVD/to burn a disc
Blu-ray disk, Sony high definition DVD disk
USB flash drive/see also 閃存盤|闪存盘[shan3 cun2 pan2]
CD or DVD Drive/abbr. for 光盤驅動器|光盘驱动器
